name: Unknown Item
title: Auto Pick Perks Lab
overview: Unlocked in Milestones at tier 4 wave 50 and after Unlock Perk completed. A toggleable ability that will select the first perk available when perks are available. Has 1 level.
how_it_works: Auto Pick Perks is toggled during a run by clicking the perk bar at the top of the screen
When an offering of perks is presented, and none of them are in the auto perk ranking, the first perk will be chosen
Always selects the top choice on the list, which will always pick your first perk choice (if available)
Works in conjunction with Auto Pick Ranking and First Perk Choice
requirements: Must reach tier 4 wave 50 in Milestones
Must complete Unlock Perks lab first
